content.rendered:
Directed by Vineeth Kumar

Written by Arjun Lal. Sharfu. Suhas

Star Tovino Thomas (Vinod Viswanathan). Darshana Rajendran (Jannat Ali). Arjun Lal (Arjun). Basil Joseph (Sajith). Arjun Radhakrishnan (Shyam). Sanchana Natarajan (Amudha). Hakkim Shah (Sreenath). Vishak Nair (Shyam’s Brother). Rekha (Vinod’s Mother (as Rekha Harris)). Jaffer Idukki (Jannat’s Father). Assim Jamal (Shyam’s Advocate). Sandy (Tibbin). Vikas Manikketh (Investor). Vineeth Viswanath (Mumbai Police Officer 1). Bilas Chandrahasan Nair (Mumbai Police Officer 2). Vivek Viswanath (Sajith’s Boss). Aparna Ram (Ann). Balaji Laxman (House-owner). Anjali Sathyanath (Police Constable). Uma K.P. (Sreenath’s Mother). Monica Mahendru (Krithika)

Language Malayalam

Producers Shyju Khalid. Sameer Thahir. Ashiq Usman

Production Ashiq Usman Productions. Happy Hours Entertainments
